name: swap_tokens
attributes: # [doc = " ユーザーが TokenA を TokenB と交換するが、"]
# [doc = " swap_account.owner の照合チェックがなく、攻撃者が他人のスワップアカウントを指定して操作できる"]
body: let swap_acc = & mut ctx . accounts . swap_account ;

let cpi_in = Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . user_source . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . vault_source . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_ctx_in = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_in) ;
let out_amount = amount . checked_sub (ctx . accounts . config . swap_fee) . unwrap () ;
let cpi_out = Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . vault_dest . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . user_dest . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_ctx_out = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_out) ;

fields.name: swap_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , has_one = pool)] # [doc = " 本来は `has_one = owner` も追加して"] # [doc = " `swap_account.owner` と `ctx.accounts.user.key()` の一致を検証すべき"]

fields.name: user_source
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ユーザーの TokenA 保有アカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user_dest
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ユーザーの TokenB 受取アカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: pool
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 関連する流動性プール"]

fields.name: config
fields.attribute: # [doc = " スワップ時の手数料設定"]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " スワップをリクエストするユーザー（署名者）"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来このスワップを所有すべきユーザーの Pubkey"]

fields.name: pool
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 紐づく SwapPool の Pubkey"]

fields.name: swap_count
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 実行されたスワップ回数"]

fields.name: swap_fee
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 1 回のスワップで徴収する手数料 (TokenA 単位)"]

fields.name: token_a_vault
fields.attribute: # [doc = " プール内の TokenA Vault アドレス"]

fields.name: token_b_vault
fields.attribute: # [doc = " プール内の TokenB Vault アドレス"]

fields.name: swap_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 紐づく SwapAccount のアドレス"]
